name: PUZZLE SLIME
description:
You control a slime through a series of short puzzles. 

Collect all pellets in the level to proceed. Some of the tiles in the level will break and leave a hole after you walk on them, so be careful!

Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

This game was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1. The theme was "Holes".

Asset Disclaimer: All assets are made by me. Some assets such as the slime model was created before the jam began.

Music and sound composed using: Otomata and bfxr.
